Description: Short name for the proposed term (e.g.
Plain-language definition of the term's meaning.
URL to a document or webpage that supports the definition.
Type of term: skos_concept (controlled vocabulary term or compound variable), owl_class (formal class for typing individuals), or owl_object_property (relationship between entities).
IRI of the closest parent term (broader concept for SKOS or superclass for OWL).
Additional relationships: broader/narrower/closeMatch/related (for SKOS) or subclass/sameAs/seeAlso (for OWL).
Extra context or constraints relevant to the term request.
